Public MustInherit Class RequestException Inherits Exception
public ref class RequestException abstract : Exception

summary.span: The base class for exceptions thrown on request failures.

span.span: The base class for exceptions thrown on request failures.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error. 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新的例外狀況使用`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

Protected Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException
param.span: The that is the cause of the current exception.

span.span: The that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor. 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|
